## **üé® Paso 1: Crear componentes de fondos animados**


```typescriptreact
'use client';

import { motion } from 'framer-motion';
import { useEffect, useState } from 'react';

interface AnimatedBackgroundProps {
  variant: 'areas' | 'team';
  children: React.ReactNode;
}

export default function AnimatedBackground({ variant, children }: AnimatedBackgroundProps) {
  const [mousePosition, setMousePosition] = useState({ x: 0, y: 0 });

  useEffect(() => {
    const handleMouseMove = (e: MouseEvent) => {
      setMousePosition({
        x: (e.clientX / window.innerWidth) * 100,
        y: (e.clientY / window.innerHeight) * 100,
      });
    };

    window.addEventListener('mousemove', handleMouseMove);
    return () => window.removeEventListener('mousemove', handleMouseMove);
  }, []);

  const areasPattern = (
    <div className="absolute inset-0 overflow-hidden">
      {/* Patr√≥n de l√≠neas elegantes */}
      <div className="absolute inset-0 opacity-5">
        {[...Array(20)].map((_, i) => (
          <motion.div
            key={i}
            className="absolute h-px bg-gradient-to-r from-transparent via-gold/30 to-transparent"
            style={{
              top: `${(i * 5) % 100}%`,
              left: '0%',
              right: '0%',
            }}
            animate={{
              x: [0, 100, 0],
              opacity: [0.1, 0.3, 0.1],
            }}
            transition={{
              duration: 8 + i * 0.5,
              repeat: Infinity,
              ease: "linear",
              delay: i * 0.2,
            }}
          />
        ))}
      </div>

      {/* Elementos geom√©tricos sutiles */}
      <div className="absolute inset-0 opacity-10">
        {[...Array(8)].map((_, i) => (
          <motion.div
            key={i}
            className="absolute w-32 h-32 border border-gold/20 rounded-full"
            style={{
              top: `${20 + (i * 10) % 60}%`,
              left: `${10 + (i * 15) % 80}%`,
            }}
            animate={{
              scale: [1, 1.2, 1],
              rotate: [0, 180, 360],
              opacity: [0.1, 0.3, 0.1],
            }}
            transition={{
              duration: 12 + i * 2,
              repeat: Infinity,
              ease: "easeInOut",
              delay: i * 0.5,
            }}
          />
        ))}
      </div>

      {/* Part√≠culas flotantes */}
      <div className="absolute inset-0 opacity-20">
        {[...Array(15)].map((_, i) => (
          <motion.div
            key={i}
            className="absolute w-1 h-1 bg-gold/40 rounded-full"
            style={{
              top: `${Math.random() * 100}%`,
              left: `${Math.random() * 100}%`,
            }}
            animate={{
              y: [0, -20, 0],
              opacity: [0, 1, 0],
            }}
            transition={{
              duration: 4 + Math.random() * 3,
              repeat: Infinity,
              ease: "easeInOut",
              delay: Math.random() * 2,
            }}
          />
        ))}
      </div>
    </div>
  );

  const teamPattern = (
    <div className="absolute inset-0 overflow-hidden">
      {/* Patr√≥n de ondas elegantes */}
      <div className="absolute inset-0 opacity-5">
        {[...Array(12)].map((_, i) => (
          <motion.div
            key={i}
            className="absolute w-full h-32 bg-gradient-to-r from-transparent via-gold/20 to-transparent"
            style={{
              top: `${(i * 8) % 100}%`,
              transform: 'skewY(-2deg)',
            }}
            animate={{
              x: [0, 50, 0],
              opacity: [0.1, 0.4, 0.1],
            }}
            transition={{
              duration: 10 + i * 0.8,
              repeat: Infinity,
              ease: "linear",
              delay: i * 0.3,
            }}
          />
        ))}
      </div>

      {/* C√≠rculos conc√©ntricos */}
      <div className="absolute inset-0 opacity-8">
        {[...Array(6)].map((_, i) => (
          <motion.div
            key={i}
            className="absolute border border-gold/15 rounded-full"
            style={{
              top: '50%',
              left: '50%',
              width: `${200 + i * 100}px`,
              height: `${200 + i * 100}px`,
              transform: 'translate(-50%, -50%)',
            }}
            animate={{
              scale: [1, 1.1, 1],
              opacity: [0.1, 0.2, 0.1],
            }}
            transition={{
              duration: 8 + i * 1.5,
              repeat: Infinity,
              ease: "easeInOut",
              delay: i * 0.8,
            }}
          />
        ))}
      </div>

      {/* Elementos de justicia */}
      <div className="absolute inset-0 opacity-10">
        {[...Array(5)].map((_, i) => (
          <motion.div
            key={i}
            className="absolute w-16 h-16 border border-gold/20"
            style={{
              top: `${15 + (i * 20) % 70}%`,
              left: `${20 + (i * 25) % 60}%`,
              transform: 'rotate(45deg)',
            }}
            animate={{
              rotate: [45, 225, 405],
              scale: [1, 1.1, 1],
              opacity: [0.1, 0.3, 0.1],
            }}
            transition={{
              duration: 15 + i * 2,
              repeat: Infinity,
              ease: "linear",
              delay: i * 1,
            }}
          />
        ))}
      </div>
    </div>
  );

  return (
    <div className="relative min-h-screen overflow-hidden">
      {/* Fondo base con gradiente */}
      <div className="absolute inset-0 bg-gradient-to-br from-charleston via-black to-charleston" />
      
      {/* Patr√≥n espec√≠fico seg√∫n la secci√≥n */}
      {variant === 'areas' ? areasPattern : teamPattern}
      
      {/* Overlay sutil para mejorar legibilidad */}
      <div className="absolute inset-0 bg-black/20" />
      
      {/* Contenido */}
      <div className="relative z-10">
        {children}
      </div>
    </div>
  );
}
```

## **üé® Paso 5: Optimizar el componente AnimatedBackground para mejor performance**


```typescriptreact
export default function AnimatedBackground({ variant, children }: AnimatedBackgroundProps) {
  const [mousePosition, setMousePosition] = useState({ x: 0, y: 0 });

  useEffect(() => {
    const handleMouseMove = (e: MouseEvent) => {
      setMousePosition({
        x: (e.clientX / window.innerWidth) * 100,
        y: (e.clientY / window.innerHeight) * 100,
      });
    };

    window.addEventListener('mousemove', handleMouseMove);
    return () => window.removeEventListener('mousemove', handleMouseMove);
  }, []);

->
```

Ahora voy a crear un banner de cookies para cumplir con el RGPD:


```typescriptreact
'use client';

import { useState, useEffect } from 'react';
import { motion, AnimatePresence } from 'framer-motion';
import { Cookie, X, Settings } from 'lucide-react';
import { useLanguage } from '../contexts/LanguageContext';
import { translations } from '../translations';

export default function CookieBanner() {
  const { language } = useLanguage();
  const t = translations[language];
  const [showBanner, setShowBanner] = useState(false);

  useEffect(() => {
    // Verificar si el usuario ya ha aceptado las cookies
    const cookiesAccepted = localStorage.getItem('cookiesAccepted');
    if (!cookiesAccepted) {
      setShowBanner(true);
    }
  }, []);

  const acceptCookies = () => {
    localStorage.setItem('cookiesAccepted', 'true');
    setShowBanner(false);
  };

  const rejectCookies = () => {
    localStorage.setItem('cookiesAccepted', 'false');
    setShowBanner(false);
  };

  if (!showBanner) return null;

  return (
    <AnimatePresence>
      <motion.div
        initial={{ y: 100, opacity: 0 }}
        animate={{ y: 0, opacity: 1 }}
        exit={{ y: 100, opacity: 0 }}
        transition={{ duration: 0.5, ease: "easeOut" }}
        className="fixed bottom-0 left-0 right-0 z-50 bg-charleston border-t border-gold/20 p-4 sm:p-6"
      >
        <div className="max-w-7xl mx-auto">
          <div className="flex flex-col sm:flex-row items-start sm:items-center gap-4">
            <div className="flex items-start gap-3 flex-1">
              <Cookie className="h-6 w-6 text-gold flex-shrink-0 mt-1" />
              <div className="flex-1">
                <h3 className="text-gold font-semibold text-sm sm:text-base mb-2">
                  {language === 'ar' ? 'ŸÖŸÑŸÅÿßÿ™ ÿ™ÿπÿ±ŸäŸÅ ÿßŸÑÿßÿ±ÿ™ÿ®ÿßÿ∑' : 'Cookies'}
                </h3>
                <p className="text-offwhite/80 text-xs sm:text-sm leading-relaxed">
                  {language === 'ar'
                    ? 'ŸÜÿ≠ŸÜ ŸÜÿ≥ÿ™ÿÆÿØŸÖ ŸÖŸÑŸÅÿßÿ™ ÿ™ÿπÿ±ŸäŸÅ ÿßŸÑÿßÿ±ÿ™ÿ®ÿßÿ∑ ŸÑÿ™ÿ≠ÿ≥ŸäŸÜ ÿ™ÿ¨ÿ±ÿ®ÿ™ŸÉ ÿπŸÑŸâ ŸÖŸàŸÇÿπŸÜÿß. ÿ®ÿßÿ≥ÿ™ÿÆÿØÿßŸÖ ŸÖŸàŸÇÿπŸÜÿßÿå ŸÅÿ•ŸÜŸÉ ÿ™ŸàÿßŸÅŸÇ ÿπŸÑŸâ ÿßÿ≥ÿ™ÿÆÿØÿßŸÖ ŸÖŸÑŸÅÿßÿ™ ÿ™ÿπÿ±ŸäŸÅ ÿßŸÑÿßÿ±ÿ™ÿ®ÿßÿ∑ ŸàŸÅŸÇÿßŸã ŸÑÿ≥Ÿäÿßÿ≥ÿ™ŸÜÿß.'
                    : 'Utilizamos cookies para mejorar su experiencia en nuestro sitio web. Al usar nuestro sitio, usted acepta el uso de cookies de acuerdo con nuestra pol√≠tica.'
                  }
                </p>
              </div>
            </div>
            
            <div className="flex items-center gap-3 w-full sm:w-auto">
              <button
                onClick={rejectCookies}
                className="px-4 py-2 text-xs sm:text-sm text-offwhite/60 hover:text-offwhite transition-colors border border-offwhite/20 rounded-lg hover:border-offwhite/40"
              >
                {language === 'ar' ? 'ÿ±ŸÅÿ∂' : 'Rechazar'}
              </button>
              <button
                onClick={acceptCookies}
                className="px-4 py-2 text-xs sm:text-sm bg-gold text-black font-medium rounded-lg hover:bg-gold/90 transition-colors"
              >
                {language === 'ar' ? 'ŸÇÿ®ŸàŸÑ' : 'Aceptar'}
              </button>
              <button
                onClick={() => setShowBanner(false)}
                className="p-2 text-offwhite/60 hover:text-offwhite transition-colors"
              >
                <X className="h-4 w-4" />
              </button>
            </div>
          </div>
          
          <div className="mt-3 pt-3 border-t border-gold/10">
            <a
              href="/cookies"
              className="inline-flex items-center gap-2 text-xs text-gold hover:text-gold/80 transition-colors"
            >
              <Settings className="h-3 w-3" />
              {language === 'ar' ? 'ÿ•ÿπÿØÿßÿØÿßÿ™ ŸÖŸÑŸÅÿßÿ™ ÿ™ÿπÿ±ŸäŸÅ ÿßŸÑÿßÿ±ÿ™ÿ®ÿßÿ∑' : 'Configuraci√≥n de cookies'}
            </a>
          </div>
        </div>
      </motion.div>
    </AnimatePresence>
  );
}
```
